EmailTemplate.description: Notify Stakeholders of a session when Send individual notifications = true in both Event_Registration__c and ERM_Stakeholders object
EmailTemplate.name: ERM Session individual notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Session added to: {!Event_Registration__c.Event_Account_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Event_Registration__c.Name},
A new Session has been created in sCRM for {!Event_Registration__c.Event_Account_Name__c}.
Please click on the link to confirm / reject the availability of {!Event_Registration__c.Name}.
Click here to see how to confirm the availability in sCRM.
Thank you,
